content: chain for the button loop and continue to work with the same side facing you 1 double_crochet into each st using the other side of the starting chain slip_stitch to the turning chain at beg and fasten_off do not press the work making up fold the shoe in half to find the centre back which may not be exactly where your rounds started and finished sew the middle of the strap to the centre back of the shoe attaching the sole attach the yarn to the bottom of the shoe below where the strap is attached and holding or pinning the sole in place at the centre front and sides work a row of double_crochet evenly around the shoe through the first row of the upper and the edge of the sole at the same time slip_stitch to the first double_crochet to join sew a button to the end of each strap at the opposite end to the chain loop sew in any loose ends sew one flower to the front of each bootee upper 2
